newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai stocks close lower in sluggish trade.
newsitem.headline: Thai stocks close lower in sluggish trade.

text.p: Thai stocks ended slightly lower on Monday dampened by sustained investors worry about the weakening economy and turmoil in finance sector, brokers said.
Investors were also awaiting a clearer picture of the U.S. interest rates trend ahead of the Federal Open Market Committee meeting next week.
The SET index was down 7.99 points to 686.92 at close. Turnover was thin in 2.6 billion baht trade. The SET-50 index eased 0.76 points to 5041.
